goal.ch: The goal of the course is designed for students of multivariate statistics with a unified treatment of both theoretical and practical aspects of this fascinating area. The course also provides many useful multivariate statistical methods for a broad readership,  including students in biology, anthropology, life sciences, data mining, artificial intelligence, and other areas.
goal.en: The goal of the course is designed for students of multivariate statistics with a unified treatment of both theoretical and practical aspects of this fascinating area. The course also provides many useful multivariate statistical methods for a broad readership,  including students in biology, anthropology, life sciences, data mining, artificial intelligence, and other areas.

outline.ch:
1Why Multivariate Statistics
2Multivariate Normal Distribution
3Normal Mixtures
4Discrimination and Classification
5Multiple Discriminant Analysis
6Principal Component Analysis
7Exploratory Factor Analysis
8Canonical Correlation
9Midterm Exam
10Model Assessment and Selection
11Tree-based method and boosting
12Support Vector Machines and Flexible Discriminants
135/12Prototype Methods and Nearest-Neighbors
145/19Multidimensional Scaling
155/26Principal Components: Curves and Surfaces
166/2Cluster Analysis
176/9Independent Component Analysis and Exploratory Projection Pursuit
186/16Final Exam

textbook.ch:
A first course in multivariate statistics (Flury, B., 1997)
The Elements of Statistical Learning (Hastie, T., Tibshirani, R., and Friedman, J., 2008)
textbook.en:
A first course in multivariate statistics (Flury, B., 1997)
The Elements of Statistical Learning (Hastie, T., Tibshirani, R., and Friedman, J., 2008)

gradMethod.ch: In this course, we will have midterm exam (30%), final exam (30%), and group assignments (40%). Bonus: Kaggle (10%)
gradMethod.en: In this course, we will have midterm exam (30%), final exam (30%), and group assignments (40%). Bonus: Kaggle (10%)

ch: 學制:限學士班。指定課程:必須先修ST6021、先修ST6038。且檢定指定課程平均成績達70分以上。
en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementST6021、Prerequisite Course RequirementST6038 only.With an average of 70 or above for Required Subjects.
